pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimating Long Memory Parameter using Wavelet // Estimation of the long memory parameter using wavelets. Other estimation techniques like GPH (Geweke and Porter-Hudak,1983, DOI:10.1111/j.1467-9892.1983.tb00371.x) and Semiparametric methods(Robinson, P. M.,1995, DOI:10.1214/aos/1176324317) also have included.
